---

## ðŸ“‹ Checklist

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md complete with Purpose, When to Use, Input/Output
- [ ] Examples are real-world (not generic)
- [ ] Related skills documented
- [ ] Limitations clearly stated
- [ ] Links are working

### Technical
- [ ] config.json is valid JSON
- [ ] config.json has all required fields
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] No large files (>10MB)
- [ ] Markdown validation passes

### Testing
- [ ] Tested with real project
- [ ] Examples work as documented
- [ ] Related skills still function
- [ ] No breaking changes to existing skills

### Quality
- [ ] Follows existing skill documentation style
- [ ] Clear and professional writing
- [ ] Proper categorization (L1-L9)
- [ ] Skill name follows convention
